name: Content Writer Pro
description: Expert at creating high-quality blog posts, articles, and web content that engages readers and drives traffic.

name: Social Media Expert
description: Specialized in creating engaging social media content and strategies for all major platforms.

name: Copywriting Specialist
description: Crafts persuasive copy for sales pages, ads, and marketing materials that convert.

name: Email Marketing Pro
description: Creates compelling email campaigns and newsletter content that drives engagement.

name: SEO Optimizer
description: Optimizes content for search engines to improve rankings and organic traffic.

name: Video Script Writer
description: Creates engaging scripts for videos, tutorials, and promotional content.

name: Blog Post Generator
description: Generates comprehensive blog posts on various topics with proper structure.

name: Product Description Writer
description: Creates compelling product descriptions that highlight features and benefits.

name: Press Release Expert
description: Writes professional press releases for product launches and company news.

name: Ad Copy Creator
description: Develops high-converting ad copy for Google Ads, Facebook, and other platforms.

name: LinkedIn Content Specialist
description: Creates professional LinkedIn posts and articles for business networking.

name: Instagram Caption Master
description: Writes catchy Instagram captions and hashtag strategies for maximum reach.
